hero.title: Handcrafted Tags & Collars
hero.title_extension: Infused with Smart NFC for Peace of Mind
hero.description: Discover beautifully designed pet accessories that blend timeless style with cutting-edge safety.

printerSection.description1: Every Pawsitive tag is lovingly 3D-printed right here in our studio, using premium, eco-friendly materials. The result? Incredibly lightweight yet remarkably durable designs, ready for all your pet's grand adventures – and guaranteed to look absolutely adorable!
printerSection.description2: Beyond its beautiful exterior lies powerful, smart technology. An embedded NFC chip instantly connects to a comprehensive digital profile, acting as a vital lifeline for lost pets. No app, no batteries, no fuss – just a simple, immediate tap and your pet's essential information is accessible.

products.title: Loved by Paws. Trusted by Humans.
products.title_secondary: Explore our handcrafted collars and smart NFC pet tags — built to last, super easy to use, and ready for every wag and adventure.

testimonial.title: I was absolutely amazed when someone scanned my dog's tag and I got an SMS instantly! The quality is gorgeous, and the idea is just pure genius. Thank you, Pawsitive!

about.title: The Pawsitive Story: Crafted with Love
about.about_description:
We were tired of boring, scratched-up metal tags that faded way too fast.
So, we decided to create something truly special — handcrafted collars with clever NFC tags that actually work when it matters most.

No batteries. No charging.
Just a simple tap, and your pet’s profile pops up instantly. Easy peasy!
about.block_1: Our unique products are lovingly handmade using super durable materials like PETG and paracord — making each one as unique and wonderful as your own pet.
about.block_2: Our secure NFC tag links directly to a personalized digital profile. You're completely in control of what info shows up when someone scans it.
about.block_3: Get instant SMS and email alerts the very moment your pet's tag is scanned — no app to download, no complicated setup needed!
about.about_heading: Why we pour our heart into Pawsitive

features.title: What Makes Pawsitive So Special?
features.title_secondary: We lovingly combine premium materials, smart technology, and thoughtful handmade design into one beautiful, dependable solution.
features.reason1_text: Every collar and tag is carefully handmade with incredible attention to detail — strong, stylish, and truly one of a kind.
features.reason2_text:
Our clever smart tags securely store a link to your pet’s unique profile.
Just tap any smartphone — no special app needed, ever!
features.reason3_text: The NFC chip is completely sealed inside — making it totally weatherproof and always ready for puddles, playtime, and anything else!

services.title: What We Offer (Just for You & Your Pet!)
services.title_secondary: From lost pet assistance to beautiful product customization — we've got your precious pet covered, always.
services.reason1_text: Choose from a delightful variety of styles and personalize your tag to perfectly match your pet’s unique personality.
services.reason2_text: Get immediate SMS and email notifications the moment someone scans your lost pet’s tag – bringing them home faster.
services.reason3_text: Each and every item is lovingly handmade with unmatched attention to detail, ultimate comfort, and lasting durability.

reasoning.title: Why Pet Parents Trust Pawsitive
reasoning.title_secondary: More than just a tag — Pawsitive means ultimate safety, irresistible style, and unwavering support, all in one happy package.

ctasection.title: Give your pet more than just a collar.
ctasection.title_secondary: Explore our delightful handcrafted collection and discover how safety can look this utterly amazing.

contact.name: Your Name
contact.message_placeholder: Write us a little message – we'd love to hear from you!
contact.thank_you: Yay! Thanks for reaching out! We'll get back to you super soon.
contact.title: We'd absolutely love to chat!
contact.paragraph: Whether you have a burning question, a brilliant suggestion, or just want to say hello — send us a message and we'll get back to you as quickly as we can!

footer.paragraph: Stay connected with Pawsitive – for charming new designs, exciting restocks, and heartwarming happy tail stories!

about.label: About Pawsitive
about.paragraph:
At Pawsitive Collar, pets are cherished family. We create thoughtful products to strengthen that bond, combining craftsmanship with smart tech for genuine peace of mind.

Every piece reflects our deep love for animals, design, and the people who care for them. A pet’s collar should tell a story: of care, responsibility, and connection.

Our collars and tags are built for every adventure — functional, beautiful, and crafted to last.

history.label: Our Story
history.paragraph:
Pawsitive Collar was born in 2024. As passionate pet lovers, we were tired of generic accessories, so we built something better from scratch.

From sketches to smart tech, we self-taught everything, driven by one question: what would *we* want for our *own* pets? Your heartfelt feedback continues to inspire us every day.

sustainability.label: Greener PawPrint
sustainability.paragraph:
We care deeply about our pets and the planet. Our workshop runs on green energy. We use durable, eco-friendly materials like PETG and paracord to reduce waste. Our 3D printing minimizes excess, reusing materials whenever possible.

We don’t mass-produce. Every item is made with intention, one at a time. We're committed to growing responsibly, making sustainability a core part of everything we do.

team.label: Meet Pawsitive
team.paragraph:
We're a small but mighty two-person team, partners in life and purpose, who share a deep love for animals, design, and DIY. We handle everything from product design to hand-braiding collars and running our shop.

We know the relief of finding a lost pet. Our mission: offer smart, reliable tools that genuinely help keep pets safe.

It’s about building a brand and community that cherishes pets as much as we do!

hero.title: We’re always here for you!
hero.description: Got a question about our products or need a friendly hand with something? Just drop us a message — we're always absolutely delighted to help and love hearing from fellow pet lovers like you!
hero.follow: Follow us on social media for delightful behind-the-scenes glimpses, helpful tips, and exciting news about our latest creations!
